CatDescriptText: Mr. Walter Hill, 7314 Monticello Street, was part of a man on the street column entitled "Amos 'n' Andy Television Show Offends Some, Pleases Others," published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 28, 1951, pg. 3
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Walter Hill wearing moustache and light colored collared shirt, holding bottle in left hand, seated on arm of sofa in domestic interior
